group_1.textRight: Hmmm, the address on the flyer is somewhere@around here, but...

group_1.textLeft: There's nothing here...

group_1.textRight: The name of the taiyaki shop is...@"Taiyaki Shop Under the Cliff".

group_1.textLeft: But isn't this the edge of the cliff?

group_1.textRight: Well, this should be the place...

group_1.textLeft: However, I can still see people around...
Whoa!

group_1.textCenter: Sorry, I didn't mean to scare you!
Welcome to the "Taiyaki Shop Under the Cliff"!

group_1.textRight: There it is! It was here!
Why are you opening a store in a place@like this?

group_1.textLeft: Whoa! Such frank questioning!
Well, it's not my store, but I'll explain it@since I'm the one who proposed it.
There's a reason for this...
The other day, a taiyaki store in my@neighborhood suffered from a water leak.

group_1.textRight: Huh...

group_1.textLeft: The owner is currently hiring a contractor@to fix it, but...

group_1.textRight: If you can't open the store... All the@ingredients will go bad, right?

group_1.textLeft: That's right!
We could sell them on the street with@improvised griddles...
But I came up with this idea anyways!
Do something you wouldn't normally do,@you know! Business is all about ideas!

group_1.textRight: You can turn even a problem into a party!

group_1.textLeft: Fiiiiishies!!

group_1.textRight: Catching fish, catching fish♪
Everyone looks so happy!

group_1.textLeft: Let me explain the rules!
First of all, for each purchase, you can try to@fish for taiyaki three times.
Since you have a free ticket, if you want to@fish just three times, it's free!

group_1.textRight: But where's the taiyaki...?

group_1.textLeft: It's...here, if you look down...

group_1.textRight: Hm...? Ah! The lowest ledge is like a lake!

group_1.textLeft: I worked hard to set it up!

group_1.textRight: That's a relief...
I expected you to really release taiyaki@into the ocean below the cliff.

group_1.textLeft: Ahaha!
They're not living things, you know!

group_1.textRight: I don't get why you laughed at me...

group_1.textLeft: There's bags of taiyaki down there.
If you catch one, you get taiyaki!
1 inside a small bag, 3 inside a medium bag...
And if you can catch the large bag...
You'll get 10 taiyaki as a prize!

group_1.textRight: Oooh!
But are you sure?
The big bag seems to be the easiest target.

group_1.textLeft: It's okay!
The bigger the bag, the smaller the area for@the hook to catch!

group_1.textRight: It's balanced!
Which bag are you going for?

group_1.textLeft: Of course, it has to be the biggest bag!
Whew... I love Sayu-Sayu! That was awesome!

group_1.textRight: *Giggle* That was a great show.

group_1.textLeft: Well, I guess it's time to meet up...@I'll call Matsuri.
Yes, hello?

group_1.textRight: Oh, Matsuri? Where are you?

group_1.textLeft: I'm at the cape...on the edge of the cliff!

group_1.textRight: Huuuh?!
